ygData.subject: Re: Site for posting languages and spell recipes fro the list...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. I might have to think about doing just that... let me mull it around...:)  I m always up for a challenge like that.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. I might have to think about doing just that... let me mull it
around...:) I'm always up for a challenge like that.


At 06:25 PM 5/12/99 -0700, you wrote:
>Does anyone on this list have any plans to summarize or compile some of the
>knowledge from this list? Of course, this would range from sharing info to
>spoilers. It would include:
> - Compiled list of learnable languages (perhaps with class and
> race cues,
>such as DE gets at Lvl 20)
> - List of which components go with which classes
> - Index of what language certain book, tomes, grimoires, etc. are
> written
>in
> - And of course spell recipes by class
>
>I'm not volunteering (smile), just wondeirng if anyone has plans to put up
>pages with some of this stuff or write pages for existing sites like eqss or
>eqv?
>
>
>Devlish DE Magician (fennin) (still in search of a good/neutral fennin
>spellcasting guild)
>
><<<Drop me a tell if you're on Fennin.>>>
>
